name: Fighting
description:
PS: This is a game developed by me alone, and I am looking for a job. My previous salary was about 70000 US dollars per year. So I hope to find a similar job. Proficient in UE3, 4, and 5, with over 15 years of C++experience.
This is a link to my work from a long time ago.https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClAbc9s_g2X7DaIn4aUvMOQ
This is my previous game link from 2017.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AYt1GNYxeX0&t=14s
This is a game that I led the development of in 2022.https://store.steampowered.com/app/2473100/Null_Sequence/

This is a common MMPRPG game.
Players control a character, wielding a sword or axe, to defeat monsters and obtain spoils of war, including experience and coins, through attacks and skills.
Experience can be used to level up, coins can be used to unlock more weapons and skills, and drugs can be purchased to increase survival opportunities.
Gameplay:
1. Explore the World

2. Defeat monsters and upgrade


3. Learning equipment and skills


4. Challenge Boss
developers: [产品名称]使用虚幻引擎（Unreal® Engine）。Unreal®是Epic Games, Inc.在美国及其他地区的商标或注册商标。Unreal® Engine，版权1998 – xxxx,
